      • askQuantity

        public static int askQuantity(java.util.Scanner in)
        Read the quantity through the console
        pre: Quantity variable must be initialized .
        post: Returns the number of different materials nedeed for the construction

      • showUtility

        public static void showUtility(java.lang.String[] materialsName,
                               int quantity,
                               int[] utility,
                               java.util.Scanner in)
        It's a menu that allows the user to choose which kind of materials wants to see
        pre: Materials utility list must be already defined
        post: Shows the materials for the utility selected by the user
        Parameters:
        materialsName - List of the materials names. materialsName[i] != null
        quantity - Amount of materials. quantity>0
        utility - List of the use of each material. 3=>utility>=1
        in - Scanner must be declared.

      • askLocation

        public static int askLocation(java.util.Scanner in)
        Reads the location where the property is located.
        pre: The location variable must be initialized.
        post: Returns a number that indicates the location of the property.
        Parameters:
        in - must be declared.

      • askForMaterials

        public static java.lang.String[] askForMaterials(java.util.Scanner in)
        Reads the name of the material, the amount needed of the material, it's price for the 3 different stores and the materials utility
        pre: The materials information array (auxiliary array) must be initialized.
        post: Returns an array with the information of an specific material.
        Parameters:
        in - must be initialized.

      • showData

        public static void showData(java.util.Scanner in)
        Show the information needed for the construction.
        pre:
        post: Shows the best materials prices, where to buy them and the final price for each store and for the best prices with the delivery price.
        Parameters:
        in - must be initialized.
